resources.string: "This item isn't available on your carrier."
"This item isn't available in your country."
"This item isn't available in your country or on your carrier."
Your administrator has not given you access to this item.
"Your device isn't compatible with this item."
"Your device isn't compatible with this version."
"This app requires more RAM than what's available on your device."
Your administrator has not accepted permissions for this item.
"You're not in the targeted group for this item."
Please describe the issue. Be specific if possible. Does the problem occur with a specific app? Does it happen all the time or only sometimes? How can it be reproduced?
Info about your device, Appvn Lite logs and some of Appvn Lite preferences will be automatically added to your message. No private or sensitive information is collected.
You can help fix this by sending a bug report to the developer. Please describe what you were trying to do when the error occurred and tap OK to send it.
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Do you want to exit app?
Please allow Appvn to run in background and turn off battery optimization(setting —> App and notification)—>Advanced—>Special app access—>Battery optimization) for best download experience.

"Google account email and password are required for this app to function.
Keep in mind that using this app violates Play Store ToS. It would probably be safer to use a throwaway Google account which has logged in to Play Store at least once and has accepted Play Store ToS."

The new version is signed with a different key to the old one. To install the new version, the old one must be uninstalled first. Please do this and try again. (Note that uninstalling will erase any internal data stored by the application)
With a built-in Appvn Lite account
How would you like to log in to Google Play Store?
Download interrupted. It cannot be resumed.
Do you want to retry downloading the file later or delete it from the queue?
annot download. The destination file already exists.
The downloaded file cannot be found.
Cannot finish download. There is not enough space on internal download storage.
Cannot finish download. There is not enough space on external storage.
annot download. The external media is not available.
A rooted device with busybox installed is required to work with system apps. Search for a busybox installer now?
Certain system tools are required to work with system apps. Checking if they are available.
Trying to log in with credentials provided by Appvn Lite
Trying to log in with the credentials you provided
Are you sure you want to log out?
There is a package with this exact name. Would you like to go directly to its details page?
Changes will be applied after reboot. Reboot now?
Working with /system partition. This might take some time.

Device spoofing is possible because users such as you submit bug reports with device information. If you want the definitions to be precise and up-to-date, please tap OK and your device information will be sent to the Appvn Lite developer.

"Using privileged permissions to allow background installation of apps requires making Appvn Lite a system app.
The process is imperfect and vendor-specific, so it might not work.
Do it?"

"You have selected to convert a system app into a normal app. Most system apps need to be system apps to work.
Keep in mind that the conversion process is NOT supported by the Android OS and therefore is NOT safe and NOT guaranteed to work.
Do not do it out of curiosity. It might break your device. Backup your device before trying."

"You have selected to convert the app into system app. Most apps do not need to be system apps to work.
Keep in mind that the conversion process is NOT supported by the Android OS and therefore is NOT safe and NOT guaranteed to work.
Do not do it out of curiosity. It might break your device. Backup your device before trying."

"Are you sure you want to remove this system app? System apps are placed into your device by device vendor and are most likely required for it to function as intended.
Keep in mind that removing system apps is NOT supported by the Android OS and therefore is NOT safe and NOT guaranteed to work.
Do not do it out of curiosity. It might break your device. Backup your device before trying."

"It appears you have enabled 2-Step Verification for your account.
Please, create a dedicated app password for Appvn and use it to log in to the Appvn.
Tap \"Create password\" to be redirected to password creation page."
Do you want to resume downloading the file or delete it from the queue?
This file is queued for future download.
Do you want to pause downloading the file or cancel it from the queue?
Making Appvn Lite a system app
Download has failed because of NetworkPolicyManager controls on the requesting application. Check your settings.
Some possibly transient error occurred but we can not resume the download. Retry later.
No external storage device was found. Maybe the SD card is not mounted.
Error receiving or processing data occurred at the HTTP level.
HTTP code was received that download manager can not handle. This is a server error.
Downloads directory could not be created or is not writable.
This device does not provide a decoder for %1$s
This device does not provide a secure decoder for %1$s
"The app does not seem to be purchased. Redirect to its Play Store web page?"
Could not log in without an account. Try using your own account.
Media includes audio tracks, but none are playable by this device
Media includes video tracks, but none are playable by this device
To use your own account choose Log out in the menu
Describe the harm caused to your device or data:
The reason you find this content or app objectionable:
Your device has not installed Appota Wallet yet, please install to continue login
No apps need to be updated

"Version code field has been pre-filled with this app's latest compatible version code. If you want the previous version, simply input a number smaller than the current. If the developer has not deleted the apk of the previous version from Play Store, you might be able to start the download."
Google Play Store considers this app incompatible with your device. This means version code has not been returned by the Google Play Store server.

"This page lets you manually choose the version of the app to download. Version code is a number identifying the version of an app. It starts from 1 and is incremented by the app developer every time there is a new version. Normally Play Store lets you download only the latest apk compatible with your device. By manually supplying this number you might be able to get other versions as well.
Keep in mind that downloading arbitrary versions of apps is not supported by Google Play Store. Your success depends on a lucky guess of the version code. Even if you guess right and you get the download to start, you might get an incompatible apk. Most likely, you are wasting your time!"
You need login to use feature
%1$s downloaded. New version of the app requests more permissions. Check the new permissions list.
Download complete. apk signature mismatch, though.
%1$s downloaded. But apk signature does not match installed app. You might have to uninstall it first.
%1$s downloaded. Touch install button or notification to install.
Updates are available for %1$d of your apps.
Allows the application to view and modify all initiated by any application on the system.
Allows the application to download files to the download cache which cannot be automatically deleted when the download manager needs more space.
Allows the application to send notifications about completed downloads. Malicious applications can use this to confuse other applications that download files.
Allows the application to access the download manager and to use it to download files. Malicious applications can use this to disrupt downloads and access private information.
"Allows the application to access the download manager's advanced functions. Malicious applications can use this to disrupt downloads and access private information."
We need some permissions are you refuse or system error, would you please go to Settings page manual authorization, otherwise the function to use!
You have rejected us for authorization, would you please authorize, otherwise the function to use!
Reserve space in the download cache
Apps are installed when the user touches the completion notification
Apps are installed as soon as the download completes
You need to whitelist apps manually
Apps installed by Appvn Lite are automatically whitelisted
Now .apks are not deleted after installation
Pretend to be a different device
If you put device definitions into %1$s they will appear in this list
This change will be applied after you re-login
Full apk is downloaded every time
Only changes are downloaded during updates
Apks are downloaded to the external storage path provided below
More secure, but the apks are not user accessible
Tracker count is displayed on details page automatically
Default installation dialog, no background installs
Attempt to set a fallback directory (%1$s)?
Images are downloaded on Wi-Fi only
This option is only available on rooted devices
Only available if Appvn Lite is a system app
Black or white list of apps for update
Chosen apps are going to be ignored when checking for updates
Only the chosen apps will be checked for updates
Force download traffic through Tor for increased privacy. Requires Orbot
Appvn only request access contacts permision to get Google account for better download experience.
Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
One or more sample lists failed to load
Sent from device definition request dialog
Permission to access storage was denied
"App updates will include beta versions. If you leave this app's beta program, you will no longer get beta updates."
"In a few minutes, you'll be added to the beta program. You can then update to the beta version of this app, if available."
"Try new features before they're made public. Give your feedback directly to the developer."
It can take a few minutes to remove you from the beta program.

"Starting this %s download now may shorten your battery life and/or result in excessive usage of your mobile data connection, which can lead to charges by your mobile operator depending on your data plan.
Click %s below to begin this download the next time you are connected to a WiFi network."

"You must use WiFi to complete this %s download.
Click %s to begin this download the next time you are connected to a WiFi network."
Download too large for operator network
